name: Rooted In The Depths
description:
Your goal is to survive through this treacherous abandoned mineshaft that has been  infected by something... unknown.

Can you make it to the end?

This project was a small test of our abilities to make a game in a week, we took inspiration from the Global Games Jam of 2023, with the theme word of 'Roots'. We enjoyed making the game, despite some of the setbacks we faced when making our first game together remotely. 

High quality is settings are recommended.

Escape/P is to pause game.

F is for interactive.
